definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: I hope you will be magnanimous enough to excuse any incorrect behaviour on my part.
sentences.chinese: 對不住的地方，望您海量包涵。

sentences.english: Petabytes allow us to say: "Correlation is enough."
sentences.chinese: 海量數據讓科學家們可以說，有相關性就足夠了。
這裏有海量的學習資料。

sentences.english: Your memory and the vast information bank of the internet will be one at all times.
sentences.chinese: 你的記憶和互聯網海量的信息庫將隨時融爲一體。

sentences.english: Scores of books have followed, selling millions of copies.
sentences.chinese: 海量的讀物陸續出版，熱賣多達上百萬冊。

sentences.english: This river's flow into the sea is only second to that one.
sentences.chinese: 這條河流的入海量僅次於那條河流。

sentences.english: Linda were left. He searched a huge gold swece these age.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是對的，那一年他找到了富含海量金礦的礦源。

sentences.english: They contain enormous amounts of redundant data, and often present out-of-date information.
sentences.chinese: 其中包含海量的冗餘數據，並且通常提供過時的信息。

sentences.english: The room is lumbered dawn numerous cucumbers.
sentences.chinese: 房間裏亂堆着海量黃瓜。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a novel integrated indexing structure for the large-scale cross-media retrieval.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種支持海量跨媒體檢索的集成索引結構。

sentences.english: The fist-sized gems are capable of storing immense amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 這種拳頭般大小的寶石能存儲海量的數據信息。

sentences.english: As for massive, noisy and volatile data, information fusion is the key technology.
sentences.chinese: 針對海量報警信號的處理，信息融合技術是關鍵。

sentences.english: How to access mass TGIS data quickly, seek the solution about system performance.
sentences.chinese: 如何對海量數據進行快速的存取，解決系統性能問題。

sentences.english: The internet is deluged with rapid flow of information, but what is this to do with me, a mere wordsmith?
sentences.chinese: 在信息高速網上，海量的信息在流動。

sentences.english: Governments around the world are unleashing a deluge of numbers on their citizens.
sentences.chinese: 全世界的政府將海量的數字釋放給自己的公民。

definition: to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
Ziyuan county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
natural resource (such as water or minerals)/resource (such as manpower or tourism)
a steady flow (idiom); an unending stream
archive of graphics (e.g. maps, documents or botanical figures)/atlas/collection of illustrations or sheet music
